sentences.sContent: On any given day in the Houston area, half the hospital beds are empty.
sentences.sCn: 在休斯敦地区，任何一天医院的床位都有一半是空的。

sentences.sContent: The rules are to be followed in any given situation.
sentences.sCn: 这些规则在任何情况下都要遵守。

sentences.sContent: ...Each statement contains information given in one of the paragraphs...
...they are prescribed and they're given at a certain level...
...compared with almost twice that many when 18-year-olds were first given the vote...
...given in March at the roundtable meeting of environment and energy ministers from the G20 group of nations...
...given that there is at least some evidence for positive effects from some of these lifestyle changes...
...You are required to select out one word for each blank from a lot of choices given in a word bank following the passage...
...But even when employees are given paid time off...
...You are required to select one word for each blank from a list of choices given in a word bank following the passage...
...Drug companies have been given hundreds of billions of dollars as we limit Medicaid benefits...
